Class Projectile

java.lang.Object
  MovingObject
      Projectile

public class Projectile
extends MovingObject

A projectile that fires a single projectile with an explosion radius of 25 that deals 25 damage

Author:
Erik Miller, Jay Sathe, Tristan Seroff, Christian Ciabatoni

Constructor Detail

Projectile

public Projectile(double x,
                  double y,
                  Tanks game,
                  ImagePanel imagePanel)
A Projectile is a movingObject with an x and y position that explodes on contact with the ground or another movingObject that is not a projectile

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate of the projectile
y - The y coordinate of the projectile
game - Allows projectile to interact with the game
imagePanel - Allows projectile to change the image

Projectile

public Projectile(double x,
                  double y,
                  double vx,
                  double vy,
                  Tanks game,
                  ImagePanel imagePanel)
A Projectile is a movingObject with an x and y position and vx and vy velocity that explodes on contact with the ground or another movingObject that is not a projectile

Parameters:
x - The x coordinate of the projectile
y - The y coordinate of the projectile
vx - The x velocity of the projectile
vy - The y velocity of the projectile
game - Allows projectile to interact with the game
imagePanel - Allows projectile to change the image
Method Detail

collision

public int collision(java.util.ArrayList<MovingObject> movingObjects,
                     double ground)
Returns a positive number if there is a collision, a negative number if there is a collision and the projectile should be deleted, and 0 if nothing happens

Parameters:
movingObjects - The arraylist of moving objects to check for collisions
ground - The x coordinate to look for a collision at
Returns:
whether there is a collision and if it is destructive

fire

public void fire(java.util.ArrayList<MovingObject> movingObjects)
Prints and moves a projectile on the screen until it collides with an object or the ground.

Parameters:
movingObjects - the arraylist of moving objects to add the projectile to it and allow it to move

contact

public boolean contact(MovingObject target)
Checks to see if this projectile comes in contact with a target

Parameters:
target - a movingObject to check for a collision with
Returns:
the boolean of whether this projectile comes in contact with target

inBlast

public boolean inBlast(MovingObject target)
